title: Sharkron
summaries: The Sharkron is a Hardmode enemy fired by Duke Fishron's Sharknado and Cthulhunado attacks. They will first spawn from within the Sharknado or Cthulhunado, staying inside it for some time before being launched directly at the player. They travel in an arc, descending at a slower speed after reaching maximum height. They are killed instantly upon impact with blocks.
Despite being shark-related, Sharkrons do not move faster in <linked>water</linked>.

statistics.Max Life: 100/150/225
